game

Class AbstractGear

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.AbstractGear
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGear, java.lang.Comparable<IGear>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Footwear, HandGear, HeadGear, Jewelry

    public abstract class AbstractGear
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGear
    AbstractGear, It is an abstract base class for implementation of IGear. This class contains all the method definitions that are common to the concrete implementations of the IGear interface.

      • AbstractGear

        public AbstractGear(java.lang.String gearFullName,
                    java.lang.String gearAdjectiveName,
                    int wornOutPercentage,
                    IStrength strength)
        Constructs a AbstractGear in terms of its full name, adjective, worn out percentage and strength.
        Parameters:
        gearFullName - It is the full name of the gear.
        gearAdjectiveName - It is the adjective name of the gear.
        wornOutPercentage - It is the worn out percentage of the gear.
        strength - It is the strength of the gear.
